metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3435 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: A vulnerability classified as problematic has been found in Linux Kernel.This affects the function fib_nh_match of the file net/ipv4/fib_semantics.cof the component IPv4 Handler. The manipulation leads to out-of-boundsread. It is possible to initiate the attack remotely. It is recommended toapply a patch to fix this issue. The identifier VDB-210357 was assigned tothis vulnerability.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
